press zero. To restore standard message press one.To check current greeting message press two. To exit press hash. Inviting intonation- in the phrase "To record your message press zero. To restore standard message press one. To check current greeting message press two. To exit press hash"

press zero. To delete message press one. To check current self identification message press two. To exit press hash. Inviting intonation - in the phrase "To record your message press zero. To delete message press one. To check current self identification message press two. To exit press hash".

To play messages press star. To change your profile press 1. To dial a number press 3. To delete all read messages press four. To change your self-identification message press five. To play mailbox information press six. To change pin number press seven. To change your greeting message press eight. To repeat this prompt press nine. To exit press hash" Informational intonation
"number" in the phrase "Please enter number then press hash"
"Personal identification number" in the phrase "Please enter personal identification number then press hash" Inviting intonation

Press zero for next message. Press one for previous message. Press two to repeat current message. Press three to delete current message. Press four to call back. Press five to forward to another voice mail. Press nine for options. To exit press hash" Informational intonation

Please hold while I transfer your call.Begging intonation
